flawed_nl_solution:
The factory due to shortages will produce 200 - 50 = <<200-50=120>>120 cars.
Due to the pandemic, they will now produce 120 / 2 = <<120/2=60>>60 cars.
The company will have to manufacture 60 * 5 = <<60*5=300>>300 doors.
#### 300

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 120. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
